channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes, 28th April
item.description:
Potholes, sunk metal cover, and disintegrated anti-skid surface prior to pelican crossing on westbound A40 in front of 295, (and adjacent properties) London road, Charlton kings? Cheltenham. Traffic being forced into other side of carriageway to avoid the problem area. GPS: 51.883175,-2.040577
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 299 London Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tail back on to M5 extremely dangerous, 28th April
item.description:
The traffic from the A4019 backed up so much that a 400m queue was created on the M5 south. With the spray and rain I saw several close calls as lorries and cars had to brake to avoid stationary cars on the motorway. The tailback was due to traffic lights creating a one way on the A4019 where nothing was happening. To do this when it is the only road in to Cheltenham from the M5 is ridiculous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Parcel 4194 Tewkesbury Road, Uckington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed manhole covers, 27th April
item.description:
Three very broken covers on the pavement near junction, labelled GPO. For several weeks they've had barriers around, but no sign of anyone actually fixing the problem!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Saint Johns Avenue, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes severe fragmentation Clarence Square, 27th April
item.description:
Hullo, just found a cluster of potholes along Clarence Square that are crumbly and with a lot of stray debris. Please could you take a look? Thanks so much Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Clarence Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public footpath entrance is getting very overgrown, 27th April
item.description:
Please can the hedges and trees be trimmed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Cottage Green Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy speed bump on Hudson Street, 27th April
item.description:
Hi, there's a raised speedbump constructed over a water pipe on Hudson Street. When buses go over it, it shakes the houses on the opposite side of the road, possibly causing damage to their foundations. Residents have raised concerns about it before, but it's keeping them awake at night and it might cause long-term structural issues if left unaddressed. Please could you send surveyors or engineers to take a look before it causes much more of a nuisance? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 48 Folly Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned items on street, 27th April
item.description:
Hi, there's some rubbish been left on the street for the past two weeks, please could someone come to collect it? It's just on the corner of Hudson Street. Cheers, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Margrett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request for litter bin by leisure centre, 27th April
item.description:
Hullo, hope you're well I'd like to submit a request for a litter bin by the leisure centre at Tommy Taylor's Lane as there's often a lot of litter in the area but nowhere to easily dispose of it, so it just gets dropped on the grass. Please could a public bin be installed just to keep the place a bit tidier? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 51 Folly Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked storm drain, 27th April
item.description:
The storm drain close to the service emtrance for the co-op is blocked with debris.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Church Road, Leckhampton

item.title: Damaged bollard and potholes in pavement, 27th April
item.description:
A bollard has been knocked over on the pavement and there is significant deterioration of the tarmac around the pavement outside the Village Hall. Including several large potholes

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 31 Church Road, Leckhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TBC Rubbish and Recycling Bags to collect ASAP, 26th April
item.description:
My friend and I have worked for several hours over the last two weekends to clear the bypass of litter. Please arrange collection of the bags we have collected ASAP. If these are left uncollected they will encourage animals, further littering and potentially, more fly-tipping. The bags and larger items are in several locations along both sides of the carriageway. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 25th April
item.description:
There are two traffic cones a supermarket shopping trolley and plastic workmen's protection barrier in the brook underneath Robert Burn's Avenue Bridge, Benhall, Cheltenham, Glos. This has been reported many times to the Council over the last 4 weeks, but it is still there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footbridge with broken plank, 25th April
item.description:
The footbridge into Lott’s meadow (near Merlin Way) has a plank that is broken. It bows under a small amount of pressure. Would be easy for someone to trip of catch their foot in in. Looks like the support underneath is the problem, rather than the plank on the bridge part.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 42 Merlin Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 MANOR, Swindon Village
